description: Oracle Golden Gate是Oracle出品的一款数据同步工具，以一种基于日志的结构化数据复制方式, 实现源数据库与目标数据库同步. 该版本针对于Big Data。
display_name: Oracle Golden Gate for Big Data
description_en: Oracle Golden Gate is a data synchronization tool from Oracle. It uses a log-based structured data replication method to synchronize the source database with the target database. This version services for big data
display_name_en: Oracle Golden Gate for Big Data
